thread.section_title: Park Lane Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: More of a dump every trip
thread.title_full: More of a dump every trip - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: rstde
title: More of a dump every trip
text: I have stayed here many times and each time it's worse. I was told that the hotel will be closed, sold, renovated, converted, who knows. It certainly isn't maintained. So if you can get a cheap last minute room maybe it's OK. But don't pay a lot because it's just not worth it. My room this time has noisy heat, and a stained bath. It's my last visit.
